messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BreastPumps
messages.msgSnippet: I also use the Avent handpump....works great to pump some for a night out...or for cereal!!!!  Of all the pumps I ve used....that is the best!!!! So...easy!!!
messages.messageBody:
I also use the Avent handpump....works great to pump some for a night
out...or for cereal!!!! Of all the pumps I've used....that is the best!!!!
So...easy!!! I've used a Medela handpump....and that was awful....used and
Evenflo electric pump...and it lost power fast...probably a defect....but now
the Avent...it is just awesome!!! :-) Bridget
